content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-13.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Wooden Chest at Position (-14.5, -48.5)
- Stone Furnace at Position (-13.0, -48.0)
- Burner Inserter at Position (-14.5, -46.5)

### Coal Mining and Processing Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (41.0, -82.0)
- Wooden Chest at Position (41.5, -80.5)
- Stone Furnace at Position (43.0, -82.0)
- Burner Inserter at Position (43.5, -80.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items without sufficient inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into an entity.

### Errors when placing entities with insufficient spacing or incorrect direction
- Verify that there is enough space and that the direction is correct before placing an entity. Consider adjusting the spacing or direction if placement fails.
